about_the_game:
PARASITE is a fast-paced, third-person shooter where your enemies are your weapons. Latch onto foes and use their unique abilities to clear rooms. Take down mindless robots and brainwashed soldiers as you fight to escape a high-tech, AI-controlled facility.

Control your Enemies

  • Play as a mysterious creature capable of attaching itself to enemies and taking control of their bodies.

  • Use each enemy's distinct abilities to clear rooms and earn Sync-Points to level them up as you advance through the game.

  • Jump dynamically from enemy to enemy and find the best approach to tackle each challenge. But be careful—if your host dies, so do you!

Defeat the AI

  • The world is ruled by ERAI, an Artificial Intelligence that seeks to "make everything perfect" by controlling everyone’s minds.

  • Escape ERAI's high-tech military facility and uncover the secrets that brought you here.

  • Save the world, one robot at a time.

Leave Your Mark

  • Bring life back to this world as you style through your enemies' corpses.

  • Make each playthrough your own by leveling up different characters and unlocking special abilities.

  • Paint the rooms scarlet red, and earn the best score posible.

content_descriptors.notes: Parasite requires you to kill enemies all the time, when doing so the game features exaggerated yet unrealistic depictions of blood.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 / AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 580 / AMD HD 7870
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4670K / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 680 / AMD HD 7970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Control your enemies. PARASITE is a fast-paced, third person shooter where you use your enemies as weapons. Fast-jump between foes during combat and upgrade your sync with them to level their abilities. Escape and destroy the ruling AI.
